than that of bare ZnIn 2 S 4 and KCa 2 Nb 3 O 10 under simulated sunlight irradiation.The as-prepared ZnIn 2 S 4 KCNO nanosheet heterojunctions exhibit tremendously improved charge transfer and separation efficiency.The ultrathin structure KCNO is conducive to the rapid transmission of photogenerated electrons, while the nanoflower-like structure ZnIn 2 S 4 is conducive to the full contact with the reactants to produce more protons, resulting in significantly boosted CO production performance.This work
